text: Comicsgate is a campaign led by graphic novelist Doug TenNapel against diversity and progressivism in North American superhero comic book industry, believing that these have led to a decline in both quality and sales. It is similar to Gamergate, which is related to video games. It is part of the alt- right movement and a harassment campaign. It has been blamed by critics for the vandalism of one store and threats of violence. Analog Devolved of Kiwi Farms is part of the Comicsgate movement. == References == Category:2017 Category:Internet culture
title: Comicsgate
